name: Astro Turf
description:
Defend your planet from the Vorgons. DO NOT be a victim of the intergalactic highway

You play as the tiny green alien. Destroy as many invaders as possible by building turrets to protect your home. More invaders you kill the more you can upgrade your turrets. 

Planets were made in Houdini and baked out as texture map to turn our low res ball into an awesome looking planet. 

All of our turrets were created as digital assets to allow for upgrades and automatic shader assignment to the various stages.  Each were then baked out in unity and turned into prefab variations. 

Soundtrack produced by our very own Camero_on and inspired by "In the hall of the mountain king".
